actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection and Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection, and Competitiveness

official_title: To amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require that passenger motor vehicle repair businesses supply customers with information respecting the origin of parts installed and the cost of available parts and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to mandate that businesses engaged in passenger motor vehicle repair provide to the vehicle owner written identification regarding the manufacturer of the parts proposed to be installed.

titles.title: To amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require that passenger motor vehicle repair businesses supply customers with information respecting the origin of parts installed and the cost of available parts and for other purposes.
